channel.title: Minecraft - Factions and Clans List
channel.description:
So I'm going to use this thread to try and keep track of all of the Minecraft factions/clans we have on the official server. There are only a few that I know of at the moment, so if yours isn't listed on here, post it! Key:
[u][b]Faction Name - Owner ([i]Forum Name[/i])[/b][/u] Description [ul][li]Current [i]Forum Name[/i][/li] [li]Members [i]Forum Name[/i][/li] [li]Besides owner [i]Forum Name[/i][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Varrock Faction - Corey ([i]LilxCj[/i])[/b][/u] The faction of the members of Varrock. [ul][li]Pblord7[/li] [li]RuneSpace[/li] [li]HcoJustin[/li] [li]whattehhp406[/li] [li]Agl1431 ([i]noobs are ftw[/i])[/li] [li]Mopar_x ([i]?[/i])[/li] [li]Mr Mopar[/li] [li]n10si t[/li] [li]drew500 ([i]drew5000[/i])[/li][/ul] [u][b]Falador Faction - Xryz[/b][/u] The faction of the members of Falador. [ul][li]joe (Unregistered)[/li] [li]Lenni_Lenape (Unregistered)[/li] [li]kortlen (Unregistered)[/li][/ul] [u][b]Viking Raiders - Moparisthebest[/b][/u] Based in a giant castle, this faction is well defended from enemy attacks. [ul][li]sly_greg ([i]k0 twin[/i])[/li] [li]deathschaos9[/li] [li]cole1497[/li] [li]mdog311[/li] [li]reyx7[/li][/ul] [u][b]Camelot - Canownueasy ([i]Canownueaz[/i]y), Vain ([i]I Vain I[/i]), matthew ([i]x vain x[/i])[/b][/u] The faction of the members of Camelot. [ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul] Faction owners: If you need to add members or change details here, just post.

item.title: Minecraft - Factions and Clans List
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:40, topic:377668”][quote author=Mr Mopar X link=topic=473557.msg3464579#msg3464579 date=1294793525]
I’m creating a new faction, Edgeville. I am still with the varrock faction, and I am allies with everyone unless something happens.
[/quote]

I’ll give u supplies for a place which I will most likely make into an appartment building(I’m agl1431 btw)[/quote]

Okay. It’s not complete yet, but when it is feel free to build a home.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft - Factions and Clans List
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:36, topic:377668”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=473557.msg3464264#msg3464264 date=1294778846]

[quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=473557.msg3464262#msg3464262 date=1294778686]

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=473557.msg3464261#msg3464261 date=1294778635]

Can you fix Camelot, me, Vain, and Matt are all owners

If you guys can’t agree on one single leader, then I think there will be plenty of arguments in this faction.

That’s stupid.
[/quote]No

[/quote]No. I’m not a leader type. Don’t tell what we have to do, it’s our town

If you’re not the leader type then pick a leader. That is what that means. You make a person who will make overall decisions.
[/quote]Nobody because monarchy is dumb
Democracy ftw

@mdog
4 people are joining[/quote]
Let the people vote for a leader then. Democracy still has an leader, he/she is elected though.

Read full topic
